attr.title: Mable and the Wood
attr.desc: Mable and the Wood is a Metroidvania where you can take the form of the bosses you kill, changing how you're able to explore the interconnected world. It's also a Metroidvania where you don't have to kill anyone.
attr.inst: You can purchase Mable and the Wood at: https://graffiti-games.itch.io/mable-and-the-wood. Download the Linux version and extract it, and place the game.unx file in the port's gamedata directory. Tested using *Mable_Linux_v4.zip* version 4 (Oct 03, 2019).
